data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Ceara.
Throw-in for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 3, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 8, Bruno Arleu signals a Ceara throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 10, Rony hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Palmeiras!
Raphael Veiga puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Ceara to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Palmeiras's area.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 13, Ceara drives forward and Charles gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Charles (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 16, Palmeiras's Matias Vina gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ceara defender.
Bruno Arleu signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Ceara's half.
Ceara pushes forward through Leandro Carvalho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Eduardo Brock (Ceara) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Felipe Silva to set up the goal.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Palmeiras are coming forward and Matias Vina gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Ceara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Patrick de Paula's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 27, In Sao Paulo, Raphael Veiga of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ceara drive upfield and Cleber Bomfim gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 33, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in Ceara.
Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In the minute 37, Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Wescley for Ceara drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Raphael Veiga of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 42, Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 45, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula is on target but unsuccessful.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras's Wesley misses with an attempt on goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Bruno Arleu will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
The first half has been concluded at Allianz Parque.
The second-half has started.
Victor Jacare (Ceara) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Ceara make their first substitution with Victor Jacare replacing Leandro Carvalho.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Ceara.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 50, Important block from the Ceara defence as Wesley fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras drive forward through Rony. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Bruno Henrique for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara push forward at Allianz Parque and Tiago gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Bruno Arleu signals a Ceara throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 55, Palmeiras are coming forward and Rony gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Ceara.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 58, Bruno Arleu signals a Ceara throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raphael Veiga (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras's Wesley gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 61, Ceara to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Wesley gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Important block from the Ceara defence as Patrick de Paula fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
In the minute 65, Charles (Ceara) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Wescley, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team replace Cleber Bomfim with Rafael Sobis.
Rony for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 67, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) has taken off Wescley who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Vinicius Lima is the replacement.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Danilo is replacing Patrick de Paula for the home team.
In the minute 68, Ramires is on a sub for Bruno Henrique for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras make their third substitution with Gustavo Scarpa replacing Rony.
In the minute 69, Palmeiras's Raphael Veiga is on target but unsuccessful.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Palmeiras drives forward and Felipe Melo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Victor Jacare for Ceara drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 71, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Wesley's finish is wide of the goal.
Bruno Arleu awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Ceara’s Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal kick for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 74, Ceara's Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca is replacing Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves for the away team.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Ceara drive forward through Rafael Sobis. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ceara's Victor Jacare has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
The away team have replaced Felipe Silva with Ricardinho. This is the fifth substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Gustavo Scarpa (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Goal! Willian gives Palmeiras a 2-1 lead in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fernando Prass (Ceara) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 83, Danilo for Palmeiras has been booked by Bruno Arleu and receives a first yellow card.
So close for Palmeiras as Wesley's shot comes back off the post.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 85, In Sao Paulo, Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Ceara at Allianz Parque.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Ceara's area.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Parque with Luan Garcia replacing Wesley.
In the minute 88, Bruno Arleu signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Ceara's half.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ceara's Victor Jacare breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Bruno Arleu blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Gabriel Silva is replacing Willian for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
